name: Lanterna Xiao
desc: Vola lontano trasportando splendidi desideri. Può essere creata presso un Banco della creazione.

objectType: Materiale per il Festival delle lanterne

value.text: <color=#ffffffa6>Si ottiene durante il Festival delle lanterne</color>

customize.name: Lanterna Xiao
customize.desc: Vola lontano trasportando splendidi desideri. Può essere creata presso un Banco della creazione.

customize.name: Fibra per lanterna
customize.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
This commonly encountered fibrous material can be processed into lantern wrappings so that the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

customize.name: Materiale per lucignolo
customize.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
The commonly encountered velvety material can be processed into lantern wicks so the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

customize.name: Frammento di Plaustrite
customize.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
A mysterious shard of elemental rock that can float by itself. It is the secret to the flying lanterns. It is also said to be the thing that powers the Jade Chamber's floating mechanism.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.
